content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
No structures have been successfully created on the map. Several attempts were made to establish a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but all placement and crafting attempts failed. The agent also referenced existing smelting furnaces (one at (5.0, 5.0) and another copper furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)) for resource processing; however, these were pre‐existing entities used for operations rather than structures the agent built.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors:
  – Avoid passing unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) when calling get_entities; ensure the invocation matches the function’s signature.
  – Do not supply extraneous positional arguments if the function expects none.

• NoneType Iteration:
  – When filtering entity lists (such as existing labs), first verify that the returned value is valid (use an empty list as a fallback instead of None) to prevent iteration errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
  – Confirm the required lab item is present in inventory before attempting to place it at (0.5, 2.5).
  – Ensure all prerequisite resources and sub-ingredients (for example, iron-plate, iron-gear-wheel, copper-plate, copper-cable, and electronic-circuit) are available and producible via proper crafting or smelting processes before initiating lab crafting.
  – Verify that the necessary production facilities (crafting machines or furnaces) are operational to produce intermediary components, reducing repeated failures during lab creation attempts.
